haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Kristof Bahr
Fw Detlef Schwarzer

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 05/08/1916 near Craonelle.
A F.E.2b of Esc 70 was brought down by Wenzel Scheiner of Jasta 16b.
Sergt Hyacinthe Berlier was killed in action.
Lt Alexis Brunet was killed in action.
Wenzel Scheiner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Adinfer.
A F.E.2b of No 22 Squadron RFC was brought down by Baldemar May of Jasta 16b.
Lt Carrick Fabian was killed in action.
Lt Paxton Grove was killed in action.
Baldemar May was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Somme-Tourbe.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc N.124 Lafayette was brought down by Herbert Klemm of Jasta 16b.
Cne Jean-Baptiste Lepetre was killed in action.
Herbert Klemm was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Woimbey.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.49 was brought down by Sepp Zuber of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Jean-Luc Porte was killed in action.
Sepp Zuber was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Ribecourt.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.3 was brought down by Urs Kehlmann of Jasta 16b.
Cne Germain Astruc was killed in action.
Urs Kehlmann was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Beuvry.
A F.E.2b of No 27 Squadron RFC was brought down by Rudiger Bretschneider of Jasta 16b.
Lt Felix Harbird was killed in action.
Cpt Quillan Seymour was killed in action.
Rudiger Bretschneider was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Champlon.
A F.E.2b of Esc 13 was brought down by Konrad Herxheimer of Jasta 16b.
Lt Philippe Gaspard was killed in action.
S/Lt Florentin Lafitte was killed in action.
Konrad Herxheimer was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near En Santerre.
A Sopwith Strutter of No 70 Squadron RFC was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Aldis Radley was not injured.
Coleman Balam was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near La Tergette.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of No 1 Squadron RFC was brought down by Hasso Lobe of Jasta 16b.
2nd Lt Hadden Goldwell was killed in action.
Hasso Lobe was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Pont-A-Mousson.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.124 Lafayette was brought down by Heinrich Schonborn of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Xavier Niochaut was killed in action.
Heinrich Schonborn was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Bailleul.
A F.E.2b of No 2 Squadron RFC was brought down by Florian Lasch of Jasta 16b.
2nd Lt Quentin Loddington was killed in action.
Lt Walton Marris was killed in action.
Florian Lasch was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 05/08/1916 near Brabant en Argonne.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.112 was brought down by Wolfram Tendler of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Germain Morliere was killed in action.
Wolfram Tendler was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.


Pilots lost were: 
    Ltn Kristof Bahr: Killed in Action
    Kmdr Patrik Schorner: Injured
